mapper.select: select count(*) from shoppingmall_board where type=#{type}
select count(*) from shoppingmall_board_comment where board_id=#{board_id}
mapper.insert: insert into shoppingmall_board (id,type,subject,image,price,isSale,sale_percent,writer ,product_name) values ( (select nvl(max(id)+1,1) from shoppingmall_board),#{type} ,#{subject},#{image},#{price},#{isSale},#{sale_percent} ,#{writer},#{product_name})

insert into shoppingmall_board_comment (id,board_id,writer,content,image,nickname) values ( (select nvl(max(id)+1,1) from shoppingmall_board_comment),#{board_id} ,#{writer},#{content},#{image},#{nickname})
